message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic opportunity to purchase my product. Given its unique value and features, I'm initially proposing a price of $13,500. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer.  While $9,500 is a bit too low for me to accept, I'm willing to come down to $12,000. I believe this price reflects the true value of the product and its potential benefits for you.

I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $9,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm proposing $11,000. I'm confident that this price is fair and reflects the value I'll get from the product.
